name: Dreamclockventure
description:
Spooky Game with maany Bad Ends and Bad Continues, Bad Continues avoid the Gameover Screen and tell a little Extra Story. (mini pc friendly low requirments)

Explore the spooky Toony Mansion, beware all the Traps, solve Puzzles in Time! The Owner of the Mansion has a Magical Object called the Dreamclock: If the Time runs out you will be trapped and transformed into one of her Puppets.

  • VR Support
  • Puzzles
  • Maaany Bad Ends and some Bad Continues
  • Transformations
  • Spoohooooky Monsters!
  • Choices
  • maaany more
  • Toony Horror
